createRequest(address,uint48,uint48,uint.details: windowStart/windowEnd define allowed START times. expiry must be <= windowEnd.      Booking terms are snapshotted at acceptance time, not request creation.

params.amount: Token units to escrow (guest must approve first).
params.hostTarget: address(0) = any host (optional). If non-zero, only that host can accept.

acceptRequest(uint256,uint48,uint32,uint.notice: Host accepts a request by choosing a concrete start time within the window. Creates the slot + booking atomically using the request funds. Window constrains START time only (intentional).

attest(uint256,uint8,bytes32).notice: Oracle attests outcome with timing guards per outcome type.   - NoShow*: attestable in [start+grace, start+grace+duration]   - Completed: attestable in [start+minOverlap, end+2h]

book(uint256).notice: Guest must approve paymentToken for slot.price before calling.

cancelRequest(uint256).notice: Guest cancels an open request. Credits owed balance for withdrawal.

challenge(uint256).notice: Challenge an oracle attestation. Caller must approve challengeBond tokens first.

claimIfUnattested(uint256).notice: If oracle never attests, either party can claim refund after end + noAttestBuffer. Policy: credit guest. Slot -> Cancelled. Booking -> Finalized.

createRequest(address,uint48,uint48,uint.notice: Guest creates a token-escrowed request for a time window.

sweepNative().notice: Rescue any native ETH forced onto contract (e.g. selfdestruct, coinbase).

sweepTokenExcess().notice: Sweep excess payment tokens (balance above totalHeld) to treasury.

withdrawOwed().notice: Convenience: withdraw owed balance to caller.

withdrawOwed(address).notice: Withdraw owed token balance to a chosen address.
